Hi,

I am interested in gathering insight into executing and managing tests=

where the environment is a possibly large set of virtualized (ie,
VMWare) =
machines of various configurations.

I am just aware (reading websites, whi=
te papers, etc...) of JUnit
extensions such as GridGain, JTR.  Also thinkin=
g possibly about XMPP
to assist in the communication of starting virtualize=
d machines,
executing tests, collecting results, etc....  

Just gathering =
thoughts, links, ideas of anyone who has constructed

t.
